title: Congratulating Sharon Roth upon the occasion of her capturing two gold medals and a silver medal in powerlifting at the Florida senior games
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating Sharon Roth upon the occasion of
her capturing two gold medals and a silver medal in powerlifting at  the
Florida senior games

WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of this Legislative Body to pay tribute to
outstanding athletes who distinguish  themselves  through  their  excep-
tional  performance,  attaining  unprecedented  success  and the highest
level of personal achievement; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and fully in accord with its long-
standing tradition, it  is  the  intent  of  this  Legislative  Body  to
congratulate  Sharon  Roth  upon  the occasion of her capturing two gold
medals and a silver medal in powerlifting at the Florida  senior  games;
and
  WHEREAS,  On December 11, 2010, Sharon Roth of Great Neck Estates, New
York, competed in the 50-54 year old, 124-132 pound weight class, power-
lifting competition in Fort Meyers, Florida,  as  part  of  the  Florida
senior games; and
  WHEREAS,  With  a  combined  score  of 249 pounds, Sharon Roth won the
overall gold medal in her class; in addition, her  84  pound  benchpress
won  the  silver medal and her impressive 165 pound deadlift won another
gold medal; and
  WHEREAS, The gold and silver medals powerlifting outstanding victories
at the 2010 Florida senior  games  were  Sharon  Roth's  first  official
weightlifting  competition;  this exceptional performance and experience
has made her even more  enthusiastic  about  continuing  to  compete  in
future tournaments; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative  Body is moved to congratulate Sharon Roth
for her extraordinary athletic accomplishments which are  a  tribute  to
her skill, dedication and commitment; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
praise and pride to congratulate Sharon Roth upon the  occasion  of  her
capturing  two  gold  medals  and  a silver medal in powerlifting at the
Florida senior games; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Sharon Roth.
